(High)

[File: third_party/move/move-bytecode-verifier/src/control_flow_v5.rs] [Loop validation: count_loop_depth()] [Loop depth calculation precision] For deeply nested loops approaching max_depth, is the count accurate enough to prevent off-by-one errors that allow exceeding the limit? (Medium)
